alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 3:37AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong West Winds Today... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Sustained westerly winds of 25 to 35 mph, with gusts to 50 mph. Widespread blowing and drifting snow is possible, which will lead to reduced visibility at times. * WHERE...Southern Wyoming and Natrona County. This includes I-80. * WHEN...10 AM MST Friday until 11 PM MST Friday * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will blow around snow, and result in reduced visibility and areas of drifting snow. Difficult travel conditions are possible. The wind may cause issues for light and high profile vehicles.
